tests.data_handlers_tests module

class tests.data_handlers_tests.TestDataHandlers(methodName='runTest')[source]

Bases: TestCase

Tests the functionality of the functions in bardi.data.data_handlers that create bardi Dataset objects from various sources

Set of tests to ensure that the data_handlers.from_duckdb function is correctly querying and creating bardi Dataset objects

Set of tests to ensure that the data_handlers.from_file function is correctly loading data and creating bardi Dataset objects

Set of tests to ensure that the data_handlers.from_json function is correctly creating a bardi Dataset object

tests.main_test module

GAuDI test driver. Executes tests of all the modules. Run with: python -m tests.main_test

tests.main_test.main()[source]
tests.main_test.suite(module_name)[source]

Build a test suite from module’s TestCase

tests.normalizer_tests module

class tests.normalizer_tests.TestNormalizer(methodName='runTest')[source]

Bases: TestCase

Tests the normalizer’s methods and the implementation of regex substitutions. The individual regex functionalities themselves are tested in a different test class.

setUp()[source]

Execute the common setup code needed for all of the normalizer tests

test_cpu_normalizer()[source]

Do a full test of the CPU normalizer class ensuring the overall output is what is expected

test_write_data()[source]

A test to ensure that the normalizer’s write function correctly produces a file as desired

tests.splitter_tests module

class tests.splitter_tests.TestSplitter(methodName='runTest')[source]

Bases: TestCase

Tests the functionality of the functions in bardi.nlp_engineering Splitter class. The Splitter has two options MapSplit, NewSplit

setUp()[source]

Hook method for setting up the test fixture before exercising it.

test_new_splitter()[source]

Set of tests to ensure that the data Splitter option: NewSplit function is correctly splitting the data into train/test an validation set based on the provided proportions.

test_write_data()[source]

A test to ensure that the splitter’s write function correctly produces a file as desired
